full_summary:
### Project Title
#### Actuarial Services for Sick Leave Benefit Liability Evaluation
### Contract Title
#### Services Actuariels pour L’Évaluation du Passif Lié aux Prestations de Congé de Maladie

** Contract Notification **

Reference Number: cb-115-96948016
Amendment Number: 5
Tender ID: RFP SEN-053 23/24
Publication Date: November 20, 2023
Tender Closing Date: December 14, 2023, 11:00:00 EST
Status: Expired

**Procurement Details**

* Procurement Category: Service
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
* Notice Type: Request for Proposal (RFP)
* Selection Criteria: Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price
* Contracting Entity: Senate of Canada
* Regions of Opportunity: Canada
* Regions of Delivery: National Capital Region (NCR)

**Contract and Term**

* Contract Duration: From signature until May 31, 2027, with two one-year option periods
* Expected Contract Start Date: None
* Expected Contract End Date: None

**Contact Information**

* Contact Name: Shirley Chartrand
* Email: proc-appr@sen.parl.gc.ca
* Phone: 613-995-8888

**Attachments**

* RFP Document: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/25272/finproc_rfp_sen-053-2023-24_final_e_11202023.pdf
* Addendum 1: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tendernotice/25272/addendum-1_e_final.pdf

**RFP Description**

The Senate of Canada is seeking a contract with an external supplier to assist in estimating a reasonable liability value related to sick leave benefits as defined in the Statement of Work. The term of the resulting contract is from signature until May 31, 2027, with two one-year option periods. Bidders should submit their questions to Proc-Appr@sen.parl.gc.ca by December 4, 2023, at 11:00 a.m. EST. Responses to enquiries will be posted on CanadaBuys for all bidders.  The successful bidder will be chosen based on a highest combined rating of technical merit and price. 

Please ensure you proofread the original text as well as the rewritten entry to identify
